page.title: 13TOURISM
page.content: The area is one of{scenic beauty} lying below the{South Downs}and stretching almost to the sea.Despite its beauty there is no one outstanding tourist attraction in the study zone.Many{visitors pass through}the area in transit to holiday beaches,Bosham Harbour or perhaps the nearby Fishbourne Roman Palace with its unique mosaic floors. The{Mill and pond at West Ashling} attract a number of visitors especially with its newly developed craft centre.Other visitors may be seen sitting by local streams admiring the landscape. A local concern in the 1970s was the increasing number of local properties being bought as{holiday}homes.This trend has now receded.
